segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and he’s balancing on it like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm they both are, like they do this all the time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’d even notice if the stool tipped over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and she’s just standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but in here, it’s chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to step in before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
